data.message:
I just want to share that I was contacted a little while ago by someone going by the name "Joyce Marie Nisley" and Claims to be a Information Systems Technician at Facebook
Lives in Michigan City, Indiana.

Needless to say, I was suspicious about the friend request and then immediately a private message.

Upon doing a quick Google Search of this name I see the profile has been reported.  My private message began exactly as the woman in the previous report.

The message I received as well as the profile has been submitted to Facebook for review.  Hopefully one more scammer will be out of here (only to be followed by many more).

Beware!  The scammers are out there.

replies.message: Thanks for helping to keep Facebook a safe place, Karen. -Jordan
